body:
I was reading the requirements you need in order to be moderator/junior mod and it said you will be given a interview on Teamspeak. Does it have to be Teamspeak or can it be Skype?

Truthfully I prefer Skype and I'm not used to TS...
body_tagged:

replies.body:
It's preferably TeamSpeak, however, if you would like to use Skype, that is also a possibility. 
They would go by your preference and how you would like to do it.

replies.body:
Being active on TeamSpeak is one of the criteria I believe.

It is possible to do an interview over Skype, just make sure you tell a Senior staff member that you need to.
